issue.title: UserCmdManager does not use world name to initialize node

content.raw:
I just noticed this affects other files as well. Did a grep over "node->Init()" and it came up with the following classes (skipping *_TEST files):

* [LogRecord](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/56be256c4ba911e9ffb6fece23b0c51170f6dbdf/gazebo/util/LogRecord.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#LogRecord.cc-353): Tried it with ``this->dataPtr->Init(_name)`` instead and that does initialize it correctly.
* [Road](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/56be256c4ba911e9ffb6fece23b0c51170f6dbdf/gazebo/physics/Road.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Road.cc-68): Would probably be the right thing to use ``Init(GetWorld->Name())`` instead?
* [HeightmapShape](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/56be256c4ba911e9ffb6fece23b0c51170f6dbdf/gazebo/physics/HeightmapShape.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#HeightmapShape.cc-201): Same as Road

Also, the convenience function [TransportIface::publish()](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/56be256c4ba911e9ffb6fece23b0c51170f6dbdf/gazebo/transport/TransportIface.hh?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#TransportIface.hh-133) calls Node::Init() empty, although this has no effect if the full topic name is specified (Note: [Node::DecodeTopicName()](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/56be256c4ba911e9ffb6fece23b0c51170f6dbdf/gazebo/transport/Node.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Node.cc-122) replaces its topicNamespace *only if* ``~`` notation is used).

And there's quite a few more classes in ``gui`` and ``rendering`` but this is probably less relevant because gzclient anyway only connects to first namespace world. So I'm not listing these here.
content.html:
I just noticed this affects other files as well. Did a grep over "node->Init()" and it came up with the following classes (skipping *_TEST files):

  • LogRecord: Tried it with this->dataPtr->Init(_name) instead and that does initialize it correctly.
  • Road: Would probably be the right thing to use Init(GetWorld->Name()) instead?
  • HeightmapShape: Same as Road

Also, the convenience function TransportIface::publish() calls Node::Init() empty, although this has no effect if the full topic name is specified (Note: Node::DecodeTopicName() replaces its topicNamespace only if ~ notation is used).

And there's quite a few more classes in gui and rendering but this is probably less relevant because gzclient anyway only connects to first namespace world. So I'm not listing these here.

issue.title: UserCmdManager does not use world name to initialize node
